languages.text: "Кхм-кхм. Лорд-капитан, вернувшиеся пустотнорожденные докладывают, что посылкой для Джай Хейдари послужила отрубленная голова некого юноши..." {n}, — Вигдис торопливо стучит по клавишам когитатора, — {/n} "Согласно нашим архивам, члена ее "торговой сети" с Футфола. Погибший... Ловкач Кор, один из Близняшек-Ловкачей, ведущих сомнительные дела на астероидах станции вместе с госпожой Хейдари".

traits.locale_text: "Кхм-кхм. Лорд-капитан, вернувшиеся пустотнорожденные докладывают, что посылкой для Джай Хейдари послужила отрубленная голова некого юноши..." {n}, — Вигдис торопливо стучит по клавишам когитатора, — {/n} "Согласно нашим архивам, члена ее "торговой сети" с Футфола. Погибший... Ловкач Кор, один из Близняшек-Ловкачей, ведущих сомнительные дела на астероидах станции вместе с госпожой Хейдари".

languages.text: "Ahem. Lord Captain, the returning voidborn report that the package for Jae Heydari was the head of a young man..." {n}Vigdis types swiftly at the cogitator keys.{/n} "According to our archives, he was a member of her 'trade network' on Footfall. The deceased is... Trickster Kor, one of the Trickster Twins who engage in suspect commercial activity on the station's asteroids with Mistress Heydari."

The deceased is... Trickster Kor, one of the Trickster Twins who engage in suspect commercial activity on the station's asteroids with Mistress Heydari."

"Ahem. Lord Captain, the returning voidborn report that the package for Jae Heydari was the head of a young man..." {n}Vigdis types swiftly at the cogitator keys.{/n} "According to our archives, he was a member of her 'trade network' on Footfall. The deceased is... Trickster Kor, one of the Trickster Twins who engage in suspect commercial activity on the station's asteroids with Mistress Heydari."

languages.text: “呃，舰长大人。返回的船员报告称，给婕伊·海达利的包裹里装着某个年轻人的头颅……”{n}维格迪斯迅速敲击着沉思者上的按键。{/n}“我们的资料显示，死者被称为‘骗术师科尔’，是婕伊在落脚港‘贸易网络’的成员。他是‘骗术师双胞胎’的其中一位成员，与海达利女士在空间站的小行星上从事形迹可疑的商业活动。”
languages.original_text: "Ahem. Lord Captain, the returning voidborn report that the package for Jae Heydari was the head of a young man..." {n}Vigdis types swiftly at the cogitator keys.{/n} "According to our archives, he was a member of her 'trade network' on Footfall. The deceased is... Trickster Kor, one of the Trickster Twins who engage in suspect commercial activity on the station's asteroids with Mistress Heydari."

traits.locale_text: “呃，舰长大人。返回的船员报告称，给婕伊·海达利的包裹里装着某个年轻人的头颅……”{n}维格迪斯迅速敲击着思考器上的按键。{/n}“我们的资料显示，死者被称为‘骗术师科尔’，是婕伊在落脚港‘贸易网络’的成员。他是‘骗术师双胞胎’的其中一位成员，与海达利女士在空间站的小行星上从事形迹可疑的商业活动。”

languages.text: «Ejem. Lord Capitán, los nacidos en el vacío que han vuelto indican que el paquete para Jae Heydari contenía la cabeza de un joven...». {n}Vigdis teclea rápidamente en su cogitador.{/n} «Según nuestros informes, era miembro de su "red comercial" en Paso. El muerto es... Kor el Embaucador, uno de los Gemelos Embaucadores que participan en actividades comerciales sospechosas en los asteroides junto con la señora Heydari».
languages.original_text: "Ahem. Lord Captain, the returning voidborn report that the package for Jae Heydari was the head of a young man..." {n}Vigdis types swiftly at the cogitator keys.{/n} "According to our archives, he was a member of her 'trade network' on Footfall. The deceased is... Trickster Kor, one of the Trickster Twins who engage in suspect commercial activity on the station's asteroids with Mistress Heydari."

traits.locale_text: «Ejem. Lord Capitán, los nacidos en el vacío que han vuelto indican que el paquete para Jae Heydari contenía la cabeza de un joven...». {n}Vigdis teclea rápidamente en su cogitador.{/n} «Según nuestros informes, era miembro de su "red comercial" en Paso. El muerto es... Kor el Embaucador, uno de los Gemelos Embaucadores que participan en actividades comerciales sospechosas en los asteroides junto con la señora Heydari».

languages.text: 「こほん。ロード・キャプテン、帰還した虚空生まれより報告です、ジェイ・ヘイダリ宛の荷物は若い男の頭部でした…」{n}ヴィグディスが素早く考算機のキーを叩いていく。{/n}「我々のアーカイブによれば、この男はフットフォールにあるヘイダリの『貿易ネットワーク』の一員です。故人は…トリックスター・コー、このステーションの小惑星帯でミストレス・ヘイダリと共に怪しげな商業活動に従事しているトリックスターの双子の片割れです」
languages.original_text: "Ahem. Lord Captain, the returning voidborn report that the package for Jae Heydari was the head of a young man..." {n}Vigdis types swiftly at the cogitator keys.{/n} "According to our archives, he was a member of her 'trade network' on Footfall. The deceased is... Trickster Kor, one of the Trickster Twins who engage in suspect commercial activity on the station's asteroids with Mistress Heydari."

traits.locale_text: 「こほん。ロード・キャプテン、帰還した虚空生まれより報告です、ジェイ・ヘイダリ宛の荷物は若い男の頭部でした…」{n}ヴィグディスが素早く考算機のキーを叩いていく。{/n}「我々のアーカイブによれば、この男はフットフォールにあるヘイダリの『貿易ネットワーク』の一員です。故人は…トリックスター・コー、このステーションの小惑星帯でミストレス・ヘイダリと共に怪しげな商業活動に従事しているトリックスターの双子の片割れです」

languages.text: « Hum. {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les hors-monde déployés nous signalent que le cadeau destiné à Jae Heydari contenait la tête d'un jeune homme, {n}déclare Vigdis en tapant sur le clavier du cogitateur.{/n} D'après nos archives, le mort appartenait à son "réseau commercial" de Castel. Il s'agit de... Kor, l'un des jumeaux surnommés les "Roublards" qui s'adonnent à des activités suspectes sur les astéroïdes de la station avec maîtresse Heydari. »
languages.original_text: "Ahem. Lord Captain, the returning voidborn report that the package for Jae Heydari was the head of a young man..." {n}Vigdis types swiftly at the cogitator keys.{/n} "According to our archives, he was a member of her 'trade network' on Footfall. The deceased is... Trickster Kor, one of the Trickster Twins who engage in suspect commercial activity on the station's asteroids with Mistress Heydari."

traits.locale_text: « Hum. {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les hors-monde déployés nous signalent que le cadeau destiné à Jae Heydari contenait la tête d'un jeune homme, {n}déclare Vigdis en tapant sur le clavier du cogitateur.{/n} D'après nos archives, le mort appartenait à son "réseau commercial" de Castel. Il s'agit de... Kor, l'un des jumeaux surnommés les "Roublards" qui s'adonnent à des activités suspectes sur les astéroïdes de la station avec maîtresse Heydari. »

languages.text: "Ähem ... Lord Captain, die zurückgekehrten Kinder der Leere haben gemeldet, dass das Paket für Jae Heydari der Kopf eines jungen Mannes war ..." {n}Vigdis tippt rasch etwas am Cogitator ein.{/n} "Laut unseren Archiven war er ein Mitglied des 'Handelsnetzwerks' auf Footfall. Es handelt sich um ... Trickster Kor, einen der Trickster-Zwillinge, die zusammen mit Herrin Heydari in verdächtige Handelsaktivitäten auf den Asteroiden der Station verstrickt sind."
languages.original_text: "Ahem. Lord Captain, the returning voidborn report that the package for Jae Heydari was the head of a young man..." {n}Vigdis types swiftly at the cogitator keys.{/n} "According to our archives, he was a member of her 'trade network' on Footfall. The deceased is... Trickster Kor, one of the Trickster Twins who engage in suspect commercial activity on the station's asteroids with Mistress Heydari."

traits.locale_text: "Ähem ... Lord Captain, die zurückgekehrten Kinder der Leere haben gemeldet, dass das Paket für Jae Heydari der Kopf eines jungen Mannes war ..." {n}Vigdis tippt rasch etwas am Cogitator ein.{/n} "Laut unseren Archiven war er ein Mitglied des 'Handelsnetzwerks' auf Footfall. Es handelt sich um ... Trickster Kor, einen der Trickster-Zwillinge, die zusammen mit Herrin Heydari in verdächtige Handelsaktivitäten auf den Asteroiden der Station verstrickt sind."

languages.text: "Öhöm. Lord Kaptan... Geri dönen uçsuzdoğanların dediğine göre Jae Heydari'ye yollanan paket, genç bir adamın başıymış." {n}Vigdis'in parmakları, hızla kavramsayarın anahtarlarına vuruyor.{/n} "Kayıtlarımıza göre bu kişi, Heydari'nin Binliman'daki 'ticaret ağına' üyeymiş. Merhumun adı... Düzenbaz Kor. Üstat Heydari'yle birlikte istasyonun asteroitlerinde şüpheli ticari eylemler gerçekleştiren Düzenbaz İkizler'den biri."
languages.original_text: "Ahem. Lord Captain, the returning voidborn report that the package for Jae Heydari was the head of a young man..." {n}Vigdis types swiftly at the cogitator keys.{/n} "According to our archives, he was a member of her 'trade network' on Footfall. The deceased is... Trickster Kor, one of the Trickster Twins who engage in suspect commercial activity on the station's asteroids with Mistress Heydari."
